attributes.review: This app has totally disgusted me. it should be completely removed based upon how it functions. it runs weirdly. please delete it now. to save us all.

attributes.review: Love the orange president, Donnie 🥰 but this app gives you the ignorance virus💗 the vibes of misogyny and racism were there 😉 but i was disappointed... there wasn’t enough kids in cages for me and I wanted to get some pedophiles numbers😝💅🏾
attributes.title: Trump 2020 🥵 but this app is a no 😬

attributes.review:
Omg. Where do I begin?  Destroyed my
phone!! I can’t use it anymore. Slow and seems to have shared my information with all kinds of solicitors. Don’t use!!!

attributes.review: Wow this was bad!!! I was getting creepy notifications that said the Trump 2020 app wants to know your location. That’s creepy, I thought China was bad this is worse.
attributes.title: Wants to know your location! CREEPY!!

attributes.review: In the words of Donald Trump himself “The app I—really, the word, I think one of the greatest of all terms I’ve come up with—is fake news.” Look it up I promise he said this.
attributes.title: This app is fake news

attributes.review: This app is so bad that I wasn’t even able to open it after downloading it because it released a stank fishy smell out of my speakers just like trump’s bussy if I can rate it a 0 I would 🤪💋🧚🏽💫❤️
attributes.title: Stanky fishy 💫🌸🧚🏽🐠
